attributes.action: natalies fight for life with cervical cancer
attributes.additional_details: My Best friend was diagnosed with Advanced Stage 4a Cervical Cancer in July 2013 aged just 33 years old, Natalie received 6 weeks of intensive Chemotherapy and Radiotherapy. And amazingly in December she was given the all clear!! This was short lived and Natalie continued to struggle with pain and discomfort.  she now has 2 nephrostomy bags and a illeostomy bag, why should young females have to suffer like this let them have the smears test under the age of 25, they save lives natalie has now been told she is terminally ill.

rejection.details: Please see petition - SOPHIES CHOICE, smear test lowered to 16.
